questions.question: Which of the following are necessary for successful collisions to occur?

choices.answer: right orientation.
enough pressure.
high concentration.
enough kinetic energy.
all collisions lead to chemical reactions
most collisions lead to successful reactions
very few reactions involve particle collisions
effective collisions lead to chemical reactions

questions.question: A catalyst increases the rate of reaction by...

choices.answer: a increasing the concentration of the reactants.
decreasing the concentration of the reactants.
increasing the activation energy of the overall reaction.
decreasing the activation energy of the overall reaction.

questions.question: In general a chemical reaction requiring a large activation energy will proceed...

choices.answer: at a fast rate.
at a slow rate.
only at low temperatures.
only at low concentrations.

questions.question: To increase the rate if a reaction, there must be...

choices.answer: a decrease in frequency of collisions.
an increase in the frequency of successful collisions.
a decrease in the frequency successful collisions.
an increase in the frequency of collisions.

questions.question: A reactant surface is increased. There are.....

choices.answer: more collisions and greater collision energy.
more collisions but same collision energy.
the same number of collisions and greater collision energy.
the same number of collisions but the same collision energy.

questions.question: The reaction temperature is increased. There are....

choices.answer: more collisions and greater collision energy.
more collisions but the same collision energy.
the same number of collisions and greater collision energy.
the same number of collisions but the same collision energy.

questions.question: In a chemical reaction, which of the following is not true?

choices.answer: most collisions are successful.
successful collisions have favourable geometry.
successful collisions have sufficient energy.
a collision is required.

questions.question: Which of the following is true about the collision theory?

choices.answer: helps to predict how fast chemical reactions occur in gases.
helps to predict how fast chemical reactions occur in Solids
It expains why the dinosaurs went extinct.
All answers are correct

questions.question: Is the reaction rate the speed at which a chemical reaction happens?

choices.answer: False
True
